import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import TodoList from'../components/TodoList';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const WorkerDashboard=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const[user,setUser]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const fetchUser=async()=>{try{const response=await fetch("".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL,"/auth/verify"),{headers:{'Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(localStorage.getItem('token'))}});if(response.ok){const data=await response.json();setUser(data.user);// Check if Google tokens exist and prompt for authorization
if(!data.user.googleAccessToken){const connect=window.confirm('Connect your Google Calendar to sync tasks. Proceed?');if(connect){window.location.href="".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL,"/auth/google");}}}else{navigate('/');}}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching user:',error);navigate('/');}};fetchUser();},[navigate]);const handleLogout=async()=>{localStorage.removeItem('token');navigate('/');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container-fluid",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"navbar navbar-light bg-light border-bottom mb-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container-fluid",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"navbar-brand mb-0 h1",children:"Worker Dashboard"}),user&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("small",{className:"text-muted d-block",children:["Welcome, ",user.name," (",user.email,")"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-outline-danger",onClick:handleLogout,children:"Logout"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TodoList,{})]});};export default WorkerDashboard;
